name: Present Day (kawaiier)
description:
Description

On one day everybody on the planet decided to throw their presents in the air so that everyone will get present… Catch as many presents as you want!

Gameplay and Controls

Move with A and D or keyboard arrows. You can carry up to 4 presents. If a stone or fifth present hits you, you lose one life and all your presents. Store your presents in the car — just touch it.

Warning

1. This is my second game jam and fourth Unity game. Just keep in mind.

2. This is a beta version. I have lots of things to add like animation, fancy title screen and ability to kick presents. So stay tuned.
